Reviews.Title: “Dirty and dangerous fun”
Reviews.Author: coreychambers
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately I have to give this fun gay hotel a bad review due to two major problems. The first problem was the gay-bashers/robbers hanging out right outside less than 50 feet from the front door. The second problem was the dirtiest floor that I have ever seen. The manager gets kudos for making an attempt to keep an eye on the suspected gay bashers/robbers. I did not complain to the management about the floor because I am not Puerto Rican and thought that dirty floors might be part of the culture. After all, American floors are usually dirty compared to Asian floors, for instance. The good news is that the Atlantic Beach Hotel has a fun nightlife, with a built-in bar. So, if you like bars, this can be a fun visit. My favorite part was the beachfront continental breakfast that was included -- only to be topped by the very attractive Puerto Rican native young man that I met for a brief, but very memorable romance. I can only recommend this hotel to the most foolhardy of nightlife-lovers. The average traveler might prefer a cleaner, safer hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Worst Stay Ever at the Atlantic Beach Hotel”
Reviews.Author: tenpepper
Reviews.Content: It was my first stay in the Condado area and it being a short weekend trip I wanted to be on the beach. Therefore, I left a much nicer, yet less expensive hotel a block away to be at the Atlantic Beach Hotel. Within minutes of checking in, my wallet, credit cards and all indentification cards were stolen from me in the middle of the day near the bar area of the hotel. It is not that I hold the hotel responsible for this (however, one would like to think that he/she was safe at the hotel), I got absolutely no assistance from them and had to seek out the police to file a report on my own (not that they were anymore concerned than the Atlantic Beach management and staff). Luckily the hotel had secured a credit card hold for my room. And although they had secured a much higher limit than the rooom rate, they absolutely refused to add a incidental (taxi fare) to the room charge to get me back to the airport. Basically I was stranded and it was the hotel's attitude and lack of concern that bothered me, especially since the theft took place on their property. The next morning when I did check out and tried again to get the hotel to add the incidental (taxi fare) to the ticket before it was closed out, the lady would not, nor would she call the manager to get apporval to do it. When she gave me their copy of my room charges for me to sign, I wrote on it that my credit cards, money and ID's had been stolen while staying there. The lady got furious at this and started yelling. After being told that the room had been billed successfully to my credit card, I had had enough of the Atlantic Beach Hotel and staff. I left without being given a copy of my room charges. It was my decision to leave a better hotel a block away to stay at the Atlantic Beach Hotel. And if it had not been for the theft, I would have accepted everything, even the extremely small, poor condition, over-priced rooms and would have had a good time! It's just the NO-CARE attitude from the management toward their guests is bothersome. One other issue I had was trying to get back up to my room as guests have to be buzzed back in. However, the desk staff were never at the desk and were out on the street talking to other people. Once inside, I felt like I was in a high school dorm on lockdown as guest are not allowed upstairs. You can not despute that the hotel is in a great location and that the bar area is fun and that the barbacks are the BEST. Nevertheless, I would recommend to anyone that they stay at another of the many hotels in the area and experience the Atlantic Beach Bar without staying at the hotel !!! Lessons learned ...and I learned the hard way!

Reviews.Title: “Awesome Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: Scorpiofl
Reviews.Content: If you are expecting the Ritz Carlton, then book a room with the Ritz Carlton. The Atlantic Beach Hotel is a true Puerto Rico experience. I am big on cleanliness but Puerto Rico doesnâ€™t have the level of cleanliness as we do in the states. The good news is that the room was clean and you can bet I inspected it as soon as we checked in. Iâ€™ve been several other places in the Caribbean and they all have the same level of cleanliness as PR. I understand that everyone in different parts of the world doesnâ€™t live like we do. The hotel could use some polishing but so can most of the city. Itâ€™s a great tropical experience with beautiful beaches. The positive: The hotel is quaint, convenient, clean, FRIENDLY, very gay friendly, thereâ€™s a bar on the beach and itâ€™s affordable. I read all the reviews before booking a room so I called the hotel and addressed it THREE different times to make sure we would not encounter any of the things I read. They were very much aware of the online reviews and they were very concerned about their reputation. I could tell they were genuinely concerned about what I read and they assured me I would enjoy my stay. I actually think I met most of the staff and can name them all by name which would indicate they had a positive impact on our stay. There were four of us so we had two rooms and the hotel staff was right, we did enjoy our stay. Both our rooms were clean, the sheets were clean and anything we needed, the hotel staff took care of it immediately with a smile. The front desk person actually came up to our room shortly after we checked in to make sure our rooms were ok and to see if we needed anything. Yes itâ€™s correct; you cannot bring â€œtricksâ€� back to your room. Theyâ€™ve had a problem in the past with â€œhustlingâ€� so this is their way of eliminating shady business from taking place in the hotel. I totally understand and can appreciate their efforts to keep shady business out. It is perfectly located in Condado which is an area of San Juan within walking distance to many places in the heart of the tourist district. For $115 a night for an ocean view, you canâ€™t beat the price, location or individual attention you get from the staff. We WILL definitely book a room at the Atlantic Beach Hotel again next time we come to Puerto Rico. Thank you, thank you, thank you to the hotel staff for making our stay in PR an awesome one!!! Thanks to Emanuel, Joel, Nancy and her daughter, Dedrick, Jorge, Armando, Ernestoâ€¦I hope I didnâ€™t leave anyone out!

Reviews.Title: “Dirty and Gross”
Reviews.Author: wsguy
Reviews.Content: If you are thinking about staying at Atlantic Beach, please reconsider. I stayed a week at this dirty hotel and could not wait to check out. The hotel refused to give us back our money if we checked out because we made reservations. The hotel is outdated, dirty, and just plain gross. The elevator is dirty, look at the light when you step inside plus it is slower than my 90 year old grandma. The beds are uncomfortable, the room was dirty, the floor was gritty with sand, and we found a used condom on the floor. We didnt even have a tv remote, microwave, iron, coffee pot, or a refrigerator. Plus the hotel was being renovated upstairs. We were NOT told of the renovation as we heard hammers and drills all morning. I also caught the desk clerk asleep at 3am when I went out for a snack. Another night I asked for towels 2 different times and the front clerk forgot. He never did bring the towels. Dont stay there. Trust me one step into this dirty hotel and you will know exactly what Im talking about.

Reviews.Title: “Disgusting Room...Great Location”
Reviews.Author: cosmicorbit
Reviews.Content: The room at this hotel was absolutely disgusting. Stained sheets, dirty carpet, rusted ceiling fixtures, the bottom of the bathroom door was missing and there were hairs in the drawers. We were told that the room might not have been cleaned because the rooms aren't always used (I wonder why). They would not change our room. Only good thing about this hotel was the location. It was great. However, I would absolutely never never ever stay at this hotel again. The first night, I woke up 4 times afraid that something would crawl on me.

Reviews.Title: “Just a regular hotel...”
Reviews.Author: DORC68
Reviews.Content: The front of the hotel seemed nice. The lobby needs a face lift but while we were there they were painting. The people at the front desks were very friendly and so were the bartenders. Our first room was very dirty and our view was an old abandoned building and we decided to upgrade to a bigger room with the ocean as our view but this room's door kept getting jammed inside and out. We couldn't get the key to turn and we struggled with the door for about fifteen minutes, finally went to the front desk and the guys assisted us. Funny how a place that makes lots of money cannot get a locksmith or change the locks. The only great things about this place is the location (four blocks awasy from fine shopping) and two blocks away from where the bus stop was to take the bus to Old San Juan. Also the bar is on the back of the lobby with the ocean view so one does not have to venture far for great cocktails. The beach is literally your own back yard which was great. The roof top provided beach chairs and great views and a shower but the place was dirty. Don't expect a four or five star * hotel.

Reviews.Title: “She was nasty even a decade ago, or so I now hear.”
Reviews.Author: storkdoc
Reviews.Content: DO NOT STAY AT THE ATLANTIC BEACH! The rooms were filthy. They apparently have zero interest maintaining the property, as seems to be the case on much of the Condado. The rooms were small (approximately 10' by 10'). Bar prices were outrageous. My significant other nearly castrated me when he set foot in the room. I wouldn't call it a "roach motel." We didn't see a single roach. Roaches have to much pride. I stayed there because it's where "family" stays, for 2 nights pre-cruise. Never again. AVOID THE ATLANTIC BEACH!

Reviews.Title: “looks seedy and uninviting”
Reviews.Author: Rivieraboy
Reviews.Content: One thing I have to mention is that the wonderful Regis (bartender) is unfortunately gone. Other guys are good, but this business will definitely suffer without Regis. He was the only reason we came over to hang out at the bar even though the bar itself didn't look all that great. (we stayed at the Caribe Hilton). The beach is very nice in front of the Atlantic Beach hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Great Staff!”
Reviews.Author: brand11
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed here before and after a cruise. While the facilities may not be 5 star, the location and friendly staff more than make up for that! The hotel is located right on the beach with free beach chairs available to hotel guests and beach towels provided after leaving a refundable deposit at the front desk. The bar also overlooks the beach and is great for people watching or sitting back with a drink and enjoying the waves. The staff went "above and beyond" to make sure we were comfortable and were very friendly. From Chris at the front desk, Dedrick at the bar, Carlos serving drinks on the beach and providing lawn chairs, to Gabriel working the bar......everyone was outstanding! If you are looking for a 5 star hotel with impeccably decorated rooms, this is not the place for you. But if you want an affordable, clean room right on the beach with a bar on premises and an outstanding staff, you would very much enjoy the Atlantic Beach Hotel! I know we will be back!!!!

Reviews.Title: “Remember, It's not a 5 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: BRGA
Reviews.Content: It's located between 2 abandoned hotels. A lot of guys hang outside the hotel starting around 10 pm. The elevator does not work, if you want to use it for your luggage. My friend and I stayed in a non ocean front room. It was very tiny, the AC is always blasting, the bedsheets as well as bath towels had stains on them. The bathroom was dusty and very small, no windows to let the heat out. There are no microwaves or refrigerators anywhere, so if you're going to eat out, which most likely you will, eat all of it at the restauarant. A lot of our food went to waste. The staff were very nice, they have people at the front desk 24 hours. Watch out for the $3.50 cans of soda at the bar. Not the best place to stay, We definetely would not stay there again. You have Walgreens, restaurants, souvenir shops, and starbucks in the neighborhood.

Reviews.Title: “worst place in Puerto Rico”
Reviews.Author: Dikkk
Reviews.Content: San Juan, Puerto Rico Atlantic Beach Hotel Date: March 10, 2005 Seemed nice when we arrived, we were told to drop the key off at the desk when we went out and pick it up when we came back, so we did. Upon returning after an afternoon of shopping, I went to pick up my key and the desk clerk claimed that I did not leave it off. I explained that I was only gone for an hour and I did leave the key with him. He got very rude with me and flatly refused to issue me a key without paying a $50 fee to replace the key. I had to pay the fee to get a key to my room. He handed me what looked like the key that I dropped off. { who really knows}. He was very rude and raised his voice to me when he refused to give me the key. I feel that I was scammed out of $50 and refuse to stay at this hotel with what appears to be a very unprofessional staff with bad public relations.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Do it!!!!”
Reviews.Author: lorencito1
Reviews.Content: Don't Do it! if you coming to puerto rico to enjoy the beautiful Island do it elsewhere.. This hotel is located between two abandoned hotels. The rooms are dirty , hallways are dirty. entering and exiting hotel is like a prison..or a pawn shop... you have to be buzzed in... you are not allowed to bring anyone to your room, no friends, visitors no one unless you pay $15 extra per person. First time i stayed there electricity did not work for half the day.. second time i stayed , water did not work for a full day.. we finally checked out of our hotel and are now disputing charges with credit card companies. Stay further down the street at hotels like "holiday inn express" much cleaner with a pool.. its walking distance so you can still enjoy atlantic beach bar or the gay beach.. but honestly this hotel is miserable.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT TIME”
Reviews.Author: Fllblueguy
Reviews.Content: My partner and I stayed at the ABH for a whole week. We had plenty of fun. It is true the hotel has some problems, especially how clean the rooms are, but was not that bad. They are little things that should be change ASAP like : 1- Ceiling Fans at the lobby 2- Iron board and Iron 3- Just dust the walls of some rooms. I dont know why people mentioned that the staff was rude. Everybody, from the lobby to the bar were very friendly and helpful. The location is great and the bar is right on the beach. Remember this is not a 4 star hotel, but has GREAT potential. The continental breakfast is very good and FREE. The hotel has this rule not to let anybody other than guest go to the rooms for security purposes and I understand that, but also we are adults and we are resposible for our actions. They have a very nice area at the PH level that can be use for many activities, but for some reason they dont use it. I will love to bring some friends and have coctails upstairs. The new bartender Regis (from France) is really, really good and I am sure he will bring many positive things to this hotel. Something else was the drink prices. For bacardi coctails it was a little bit expensive and also the drinks are week. I want to see a littlebit more rum on my PiÃ±a Colada. For the price that we paid, especially in high Season it was pretty good. Just to seat at the bar looking at the beach its priceless. I think the hotels is going to improve little by little for better. Also they need more than one person for the afternoon, only one person was at the bar and arranging chairs at the beach at the same time. I defenetely recomend the Ocean View rooms. Water pressure was very good for showering and closets were very good size. The beds were very clean as well as pillows. In general it is a nice place to stay, especially for the price. Everybody was very nice and we had a very good time. Also the beach is the best around. Other very pricy hotels around do not have the nice beach out front like the ABH. They also provide you with the beach chairs, umbrella, and towels. One of the managers was always very friendly and making sure we were ok. If you want to spend $300 a night at the MArriott ( room are old anyways) go ahead, but is not worth it. The Atlantic Beach Hotel was good enough for us and we had a lot of fun. We will come back again soon. :-) Did I mention HAPPY HOUR??? Monday - Saturday 5 - 7

Reviews.Title: “What a Dump !”
Reviews.Author: chgosfs
Reviews.Content: EVERY bad review that you read about this place is completely true ... what could be a gem on the ocean is nothing more than a bad cold sore as far as hotel and management are concerned ... the problem is, is that management doesn't care AND what's worse, after people read these reviews many still stay there anyway ... there is absolutely NO reason too ... there are plenty of much nicer places to stay either in the Condado area or in Old San Juan .... If you're looking for good food and shopping stay in the Old San Juan area ....

Reviews.Title: “A piece of dingy paradise”
Reviews.Author: 9ine
Reviews.Content: The rooms are a little dingy, bringing your own pillow case is advised, but overall its cheap and you can't beat the location. The bar on the beach is to die for, and the beach it's self is really nice. The staff was really freindly and you cant beat the free continental breakfast on the patio over looking the beach. This place would be perfect if they would just clean their rooms more and get new sheets. If you just want a chill vacation on a beautiful beach this is the place to stay. Overall I would go back again in a heartbeat.

Reviews.Title: “Beware - Out Traveler review”
Reviews.Author: LosGatosKyle
Reviews.Content: My partner and I switched our hotel reservation to the Atlantic Beach after I read about it in OUT Traveler. What a mistake. The place was so dirty we refused to stay there - and this after looking at two different rooms. The first one had a ratty looking bedspread and a lumpy mattress. I pulled back the sheets and not only found pubic hair but semen stains. We couldn't believe it, hands down the grossest hotel I've ever set foot in. The bathroom was dirty as well and the lobby had peeling paint. The bar stools were rusted. And this was all after OUT Traveler said the bar had been renovated. We refused to stay and then they refused to refund my money until I threw a huge fit and refused to back down. This place is a dump. Ignore OUT Traveler's continual pushing of this joint - for what reason I don't know.

Reviews.Title: “Much Better Places to Stay”
Reviews.Author: Theotherguy1
Reviews.Content: It may be a gay hotel but the service is terrible. After 1 night I left and switched to the Hampton Inn. Sure it was a bit farther but they had no problems with gay clients, great service, and no problem having friends visit.

Reviews.Title: “Atlantic Beach Hotel may be a bit rundown”
Reviews.Author: skywaitress
Reviews.Content: but overall it's not too bad. I stayed at the Atlantic Beach late last August 2006 for the first time in several years. I was really miffed because the management has decided to restrict who can come and go from the guest rooms -- for no reason I could asertain other than the management has decided to appoint itself as the gay moral majority. I queried the the manager (or owner -- he didn't identify his role at the Atlantic Beach, except he lives in the penthouse), and his response to my query about this policy was "we don't want that here." Who is we? I will find other accommodation when I return.

Reviews.Title: “Dark, dingy rooms with poor AC. Go somewhere else.”
Reviews.Author: toandfromtheairport
Reviews.Content: From the outside, this gay hotel looks clean. The room I had at the rear of the property was very dark, in fact to read I had to go into the bathroom. The decor was extremely outdated and the air conditioning had no controls and was not cool enough. A total makeover is required to make these rooms habitable.

Reviews.Title: “Go somewhere else..”
Reviews.Author: hardriderbabe
Reviews.Content: Not all the way clean, stained sheets, smokey... No parking. We had to change from the 1st room to another because the bathroom was not clean. Bring shower shoes!! The AC was central regulated by the hotel, so even though we don't smoke, we could smell the other people smoking in our floor. Noisy and poor customer service. The only good thing is a great location, in the heart of the tourist zone, and with its own beach. Beach chair and umbrella provided. It was relatively cheap, considering location. If you have a little more money go somewhere else. If you dont care about sleeping in a noisy environment on a bad bed, save some money and stay here. Will NEVER go back.

Reviews.Title: “this place is a shame”
Reviews.Author: JJAY74
Reviews.Content: i have to say that this hotel is in a really bad condition if you read the negative reviews all are true.i wanted to stay here because as a gay person love to support my people. the facility is very old needs alot of work i stay here for 5 days,my first and last time this place it`s a shame!! please sell this hotel to someone that really love gay people. if you go to puerto rico get a drink in this hotel bar and look around and you will see that everything is true. but DO NOT STAY HERE!

Reviews.Title: “Water is mixed into their liquor...illegal?”
Reviews.Author: francesco212
Reviews.Content: I've stayed once before and decided to give it a second chance. I won't make the mistake again. The property has gone downhill considerably AND IT WASN'T GREAT BEFORE...just a few snippets from my recent 3 day stay: 1. I was told I could park along the gym on the side of the building by reception (everyone else seems to park there too) and 6 hours later had a $75 ticket on my car. They apparently like to target tourists' cars, I had a Hertz with neverlost in it so it was obvious and the cars in front/behind me has no tickets. 2. The room was filthy. The air conditioner was rusted so bad that I'm shocked it had the ability to freeze me to death- as it did. 3. I changed my arrival date within 10 days and they almost refused the change. Poorest cust. service I've seen and I live in Manhattan! I needed to change my vacation dates due to a work trip which came up. NOW FOR THE ICING ON THE CAKE... 4. My friend doesn't drink so she ordered a pineablle juice and I had a single beer, 2 drinks = $16 ($8 local beer and $8 juice). I haven't even seen those prices in my 6 years in NYC (yet). 5. THEY ABSOLUTELY MIX WATER WITH THEIR LIQUOR. THERE ARE TINY BUBBLES IN THE VODKA AND TEQUILLA WHICH MAKE IT CLEAR HOW THEY RIP YOU OFF, ALL ASIDE FROM THE FACT THAT 5 HARD DRINKS WON'T EVEN GET YOU BUZZED. IF YOU DON'T BELIEVE ME THEN ORDER A SHOT (JUST MAKE SURE THAT THEY USE THE SAME BOTTLE AS THE DRINKS THEY POURED YOU EARLIER). F.

Reviews.Title: “FANTASTIC VACATION”
Reviews.Author: sierraalta
Reviews.Content: We recently stayed at the Atlantic Beach Hotel for 5 nights and very much enjoyed our entire stay at the property. The location is directly on the beach and within walking distance to some great restaurants. The staff at the front desk and bar employees treated us great. The maids were also very nice, although there was a bit of a language barrier at times we were very pleased with the way they cleaned our rooms and they always left us extra towels. We definately plan on returning very soon to Puerto Rico and the Atlantic Beach Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and right on the beach”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I had the pleasure of staying at the Atlantic Beach Hotel in June 2006. This hotel is right on beach. I found the staff to be extremely friendly. The hotel offers a dining area which overlooks the beach so every morning I enjoyed having my continental breakfast while looking at the fabulous ocean! The rooms were clean and the bed was comfortable. The weather was quite humid so the air conditioning was a comfortable relief. The patio bar is the best in the area for atmosphere, music, and view of the ocean. Bottom line, I had a great time and loved the Atlantic Beach Hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Hotel did not refund my deposit”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I had a reservation for a two week say at the hotel. I heard of a government crisis and did not feel comfortable going to Puerto Rico at that time. I called the hotel about 10 days before to cancel my reservation. The hotel refused to refund me my two day deposit. They were not courteous to me or cooperative. I have been going to the hotel for years and would have gladly put my deposit towards a future day. The refused and were very nasty. Now I now why this hotel has so many negative reviews.

Reviews.Title: “Had A Great Stay At This Hotel”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I wont say this was an excellent hotel but I enjoy my stay for six days with my partner. Everything was convinent for us, we both loved the beach and the good service they provided. Just one bit problem and that was it was no refergerator in the room we were in which i believe was the Standard room but not much I can complain for good price.

Reviews.Title: “Another Positive Stay at The Atlantic”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We recently returned on 3/23/2006 from our fifth annual stay at the Atlantic Beach Hotel. Based on our past visits we have never understood some of the negative commente made about this hotel. We have always found more good points about this hotel than negative. This year we were able to book our reservation directly thru their web site on their new reservations system which we found to be very quick and convenient. All of the rooms we have stayed in over the past 5 years have been absolutely fine with ample space and always very clean bathrooms with plenty of towels. All of the staff is really very friendly and helpful and the service could not be faulted. The location is ideal and so close to everywhere that we have always wanted to go while in Puerto Rico. We look forward to our sixth visit next year, and we will continue to recommend the Atlantic Beach based on our past five stays.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel/Location”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: I just returned from Puerto Rico and a 15 night stay at the Atlantic Beach Hotel. I have to admit to being worried about booking such a long stay at this hotel after a few of the negative reviews. But from the moment I arrived I knew it would be a great place to stay. All of the employees and management made me feel right at home from the day I arrived to the day I departed. They were all so friendly and helpful, and couldn't do enough for me. The hotel's location is perfect with a good selection of restaurants close by. The Atlantic Beach Bar was really HOT, and was always a great place for drinks and meeting locals. All in all, I had a very positive experience at the Atlantic Beach Hotel and have already booked my return trip for July 2006.

Reviews.Title: “i had a good time”
Reviews.Author: adventurer searcher
Reviews.Content: I stayed solo at Atlantic beach for 8 days at the end of March, and had a great time. It may help to have a somewhat limited expectations. It's not the Marriott, which for me is a plus. It is a great location, on the beach, in the center of the Condado, lots of places to eat, shop, or hang out. There are hot bars and dance clubs in Santerce, just up the hill,and the spectacular Old City a short cab ride away. I had a room facing the ocean, (very clean) and really enjoyed that. The rooms are modest but comfortable. It's true that the airconditioning is cold and the only solution is to tape over the ducts but, so what. I didn't care, as i was at the beach all day, at the bar in the hotel for happy hour each night, and otherwise with my friends out doing things. Staff was really friendly and helpful, from the beach boys to the front desk, to the cool Jamaican woman who cooks breakfast. Probably helped that the weather was perfect, clear and 85 degrees and beach full of hot guys, but that's really what i came for. There's a great terrace on the 5th floor, with a beautiful view, very private, very peaceful. check it out.

Reviews.Title: “Not a Bad Place”
Reviews.Author: Aleoop2113
Reviews.Content: I would like to say its not as bad as the reviews make it to be. I hear people talking about bugs and the place not being clean. What lies! I saw cleaning peoples every day changing the sheets and cleaning the rooms. The staff was very helpful and kind. Yes its not a five star hotel so do don't expect it. I went with my partner and 2 other guys. We all would agree that it served its purpose for the 2 weeks that we were there. There could be improvements but you get what you pay for!

Reviews.Title: “Lousy hotel, friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: We didn't know that it was a predominantly gay hotel, but learned from the info desk at the airport. Taxi driver said we were the second straight couple he had taken there in 14 years. When we were there, though, it was mostly gay couples, plus some straight couples and families-- very subdued, in spite of the photos of cross-dressers in the lobby. The room was dumpy, uncomfortable mattress, fungus on ceiling. No control over the AC-- the room was FREEZING! Their only solution was to put tape over the vent. Argh. Still, the staff at the desk was always available with advice and a smile-- more approachable and friendly than anywhere else we experienced in San Juan. The hotel was right on the beach, and the beach was WONDERFUL. It was great to be right on the water.

Reviews.Title: “For the price - No complaints”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: My stay at the Atlantic Beach Hotel was exactly what I expected for the price. The rooms are small but when in San Juan, how much time are you going to spend in there. The room was cleaned daily and the beds were made, as well as all the linens replaced. The beach is one of the nicest around which explains all the people not staying at the hotel there. If you are an extremely high maintenance person, don't stay here. If you want something comfortable, clean, and affordable this is the place to stay.

Reviews.Title: “Recent Stay”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: This hotel is located in the Condado on the beach in San Juan. While the hotel is a great location and has a bar on the beach, this hotel has limited services, the front desk staff is unfriendly and is not helpful, the rooms are dirty, the bar is loud and you can not sleep, the hotel is in general a run down hotel on the beach. They charge top dollar for this hotel and for the money, you can find other hotels. I was told there was a hot tub on the roof - when I arrive there was no hot tub. Ocean view is through a small window. The breakfast is a muffin only in a dirty run down restaurant. I rate this hotel terrible in all aspects. Especially the reason you go to San Juan - the beach - is terrible, small and dirty.

Reviews.Title: “FUN NIGHT”
Reviews.Author: Worldtraverler08
Reviews.Content: We always cruise out of San Juan, this time we stayed 3 night before our cruise..... the first night we got in late from our flight.... we hung around the hotel and had more than a few drinks at the bar. There we met the best bartender!! We had a great time meeting alot of people and laughing it up all night.... the next few days and night we explored the city, we always come back to a clean room, the service is always nice. We never encountered anything seedy or suspicious... besides every hotel has its dark corners. I would definately recommend a few nights here for any of my gay freinds!!!
